reservation_loading_error: We’re having some problems finding your reservation. Please, contact your host and tell him to send the link again
link_expired_loading_error: The link has expired. Please, go back to the email or message and click on the link again. Still expired? Contact you host and tell him to send the link again
name: Name
at_least_one_field_is_missing: At least one field is missing. Missing fields are highlighted in red. Please complete your personal data before continuing.
cant_be_equal_or_greater_than_today: Can't be equal or greater than actual date
cant_be_equal_or_smaller_than_birth_date: Can't be equal or smaller than birth date
cant_be_equal_or_after_than_issue_date: Can’t be equal or after than date of issue
keep_your_doc_inside_the_box: Keep your document inside the box
single_page_that_contains_all_the_data: Single page that contains all the data
hope_you_will_come_back_soon: Hope you will come back soon!
expired_link_message: The online check-in is no longer available for this reservation.
authorities_mark_mandatory_to_accept: In order to continue  with the registration you must accept the <1>Privacy Policy</1>.
authorities_mark_mandatory_to_accept_con: In order to continue with the registration you must accept the <1>contract</1> and the <1>Privacy Policy</1>.
please_accept_contract_and_private_polic: Please, accept the Privacy Policy and Contract
please_sign_and_accept_privacy_policy_an: Please sign inside the box. You can use your finger or mouse. Don’t forget to <1>accept the contract and the Privacy Policy</1>
please_sign_and_accept_privacy_policy: Please sign inside the box. You can use your finger or mouse. Don’t forget to accept <1>Privacy Policy.</1>
contract_checkbox_label: I read and accept the contract.
you_have_to_sign: You have to sign before continuing.
it_could_take_seconds: It could take a couple of seconds
try_again_or_contact: Please try again. If the error persists, contact our support team.
to_send_you_key_you_have_to: To send you the virtual key you have to complete 2 simple steps
please_capture_side_with_photo: Please do capture the side that contains your photo
take_a_selfie_tips: Now take a selfie and we will compare both photos. Remove anything that could make you look different (like glasses, hats…)
keep_your_face_inside_the_blue_square: Keep your face inside the blue square
identity_verification_success_text: When all the guests of the reservation have completed the online check-in, you will receive an email with the virtual key and the entry instructions.
you_are_registered_but_we_cannot_send_ke: You are already registered but we cannot send you the virtual key because the biometric match has failed twice.
we_are_comparing_doc_and_selfie: We are comparing your photo from your document with your selfie.
identity_verification_error_text: Make sure to take a picture of the document first and then a selfie
the_docs_you_can_use_depend_on_nat: The docs you can use depend on your nationality:
nationality_identity_document: National Identity Document, Passport, Residence Permit, Driving License
p_residence_permit_did_foreign_documents: Passport, Residence Permit, Diplomatic ID, Foreign Document
id_cert_doc_p_dr_lic_serv_p: ID, Certificate Document, Passport, Driving Licence, Service Passport
p_srp_eurp: Passport, Spanish Residence Permit, EU Residence Permit
you_have_two_ways_to_add_data: You have <1>two ways</1> to add your personal data as it is required by law.
scan_where_mrz_code_is: Scan your ID or passport by the side where the <1>MRZ code</1> is.
be_sure_that_data_correct: Please be sure that all your data has been entered correctly before going through the next step.
date_when_the_doc_created: Date when the document was created. (It is <1>not</1> the expiration date)
only_basic_letters_are_allowed: Only basic letters and numbers characters are allowed
doc_number_dni_letter_error: Wrong DNI Letter (check the DNI number)
doc_number_dl_letter_error: Wrong DL Letter (check the DL number)
doc_number_nie_letter_error: Wrong NIE Letter (check the NIE number)
scanner_cannot_detect_try_to_add_manuall: The scanner cannot detect your document correctly, please try to add your information manually.
please_open_in_safari: Your browser doesn't support a webcam, please open the link in Safari.
please_try_a_different_browser: Your camera doesn't work in this browser. Please, try to open the link in a different browser.
please_try_safari: Due to Apple restrictions, the camera doesn’t work in other browsers like Chrome, only works in Safari. Open the page in Safari for a better experience.
error_boundary_message: We have smart people investigating what is wrong and we will get a solution very soon. Please come back in a couple of minutes or refresh the page.
describe_what_happened: What happened? Please describe in details what you were doing before the error
cardholder_name: Full Name (as it is on the payment card)
tourist_taxes_are_mandatory_in_countries: Touristic taxes are mandatory in some territories
depending_on_country_you_pay_taxes: Depending on the country or region, you may be subject to pay taxes.
taxes_may_vary: Taxes may vary also depending on the place, age of the guests, days of stay…
you_have_to_pay_taxes: By law, you have to pay tourist taxes in this region
payment_creds_already_added: Your card details are already added.
calced_price_is_incorrect: We have troubles calculating your correct price.
calced_price_not_found: We have troubles calculating your price.
would_you_like_to_make_deposit: Would you like to make your deposit now?
you_can_make_deposit_before_arriving: You can make the deposit before arriving.
i_accept_deposit_rules: By clicking on accept I do consent to retain the deposit amount from my credit card.
the_amount_will_be_released_on_date: The amount will be released on {{date}}
it_is_mandatory_to_deposit: It is mandatory to block the deposit amount to complete the registration. Don't worry, the amount will be just temporary blocked, we are not going to charge you.
your_deposit_has_been_made: Your deposit has been successfully made
camera_permissions_denied: The camera doesn't open? Make sure to <2>allow the browser permission</2> to use the camera.
it_is_mandatory_to_pay_for_your_booking: It is mandatory to pay for your booking before completing the registration.
select_nationality_and_document_to_conti: First, select your nationality and the document type to continue.
identetify_verification_error_can_procee: We couldn't verify your identity but you can continue to complete the registration. Your host might have to verify the photos manually.
deal_terms_and_conditions: This deal is subject to <2>Terms & Conditions</2>
add_your_email_text: We need your email to keep you informed about your deal status and provide a contact to the host.
select_guest_from_list: Select a guest from the list:
offer_requested_text: We will send you an email once your host has accepted/rejected your request.
you_are_first_guest_register: You're the first guest. Please complete your registration to purchase deals.
you_are_going_to_delete_payment: You are going to delete selected payment.
dont_have_your_guests_question: Don’t have your guests with you?
share_this_link_to_guests: Share this link so they can complete the online checkin themselves.
retry_identity_verification_error_text: Your photos don't match but you can continue with your registration. Your host will review them.
identity_verification_completed_text: All guest have been successfully identified. You're all set and read to enjoy your stay!
complete_online_checkin_email_subject: Complete the Online check-in to save time
complete_online_checkin_email_body: Hi, I wanted to share with you the page to complete the Online check-in for our reservation at {{housingName}}, this will save us time upon our arrival. I already completed my information, is very simple, just visit this link: {{link}}
identity_verification_pending_text: There are some pending guests that couldn't be identified with the photos provided. Click on the button next to the name to retry the process or share the link to the pending person.
complete_identity_verification_email_bod: Hi,the host requested to retry the identity verification since the process couldn’t be completed with the photos you sent. Here’s the link to retry the process: {{link}}
complete_iden_verif_whatsapp_repeat: Hi, the host requested to retry the identity verification since the process couldn’t be completed with the photos you sent. Here’s the link to retry the process: {{link}}
complete_iden_verif_whatsapp: Hi, I wanted to share with you the page to complete the Online check-in for our reservation at {{housingName}}, this will save us time upon our arrival. I already completed my information, is very simple, just visit this link: {{link}}
identity_verification_title: This reservation requires an identity verification. This will just take a few steps.
take_photo_your_document: Take a photo of your document
select_nationality_and_document_type: Select your nationality and document type
only_identity_verification_success_text: The identity verification has been successfully confirmed!
only_doc_file_types: Only JPEG, JPG and PNG files
only_pdf_and_doc_file_types: Only JPEG, JPG, PNG or PDF files
incorrect_file_type_only_file_types_allo: Incorrect file type. Only JPEG, JPG or PNG files are allowed
incorrect_file_type_only_jpg_allowed: Incorrect file type. Only JPG files are allowed
incorrect_file_type_only_pdf_and_file_ty: Incorrect file type. Only JPEG, JPG, PNG or PDF files are allowed
try_again_mrz_or_contact: Please take a picture of the side of the document where the MRZ is. If the error persist, contact our support team.
bank_authentication_process_has_failed: Your bank authentication process has failed. Please, try again.
welcome_to_housing_name_subtitle: To start the online check-in provide one of the following data:
lead_guest_email_tooltip: The email address used when booking the reservation
provide_more_details_description: Please provide additional details about your reservation to start the online check-in process.
